4.label: Orientation
4.description: Controls the on/off orientation of the rocker switch

7.label: Remote dim level increment
7.description: Number of dim levels to change for each dim step when remotely commanded

8.label: Remote dim step duration
8.description: Interval between dimming steps when remotely commanded

9.label: Dim Level Increment
9.description: Indicates the number of levels (1-99) to change dimming each step

10.label: Step Duration
10.description: The number of tens of milliseconds (1-255) to delay on each dimming step.
